synopsis.text:
Otter, Frog, and Tortoise, the whimsical trio of animal friends from the lush Bosco forest, embark on a daring adventure to rescue Princess Apricot, the rightful heir to Fountainland's throne and protector of the Fountain of Life. This enchanted spring is the lifeblood of the Bosco World, and if Apricot cannot claim her throne before the next solar eclipse, the fountain will cease to flow.

When the nefarious Hoodman and his cronies kidnap the princess, the brave animal friends leap into action. Together, they traverse the skies in a hot air balloon, brimming with dreams, hope, and love, to save Apricot and preserve their idyllic life. Based on Tony Wolf's beloved book, this thrilling anime adaptation promises a heartwarming journey filled with excitement, danger, and the true power of friendship. Will Apricot and her newfound allies reach Fountainland in time to save the Bosco World? Join them on their quest and discover the importance of unity and water, the essence of life.
